import re

files_to_analyze = {
    'src/arm_reference_mcp/server.py': 23,
    'src/arm_reference_mcp/cloud_migration_server.py': 7,
    'src/arm_reference_mcp/docs_rag_server.py': 7,
    'src/arm_reference_mcp/tinyml_server.py': 7,
}

for filepath, tool_count in files_to_analyze.items\(\):
    with open\(filepath, 'r', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
        content = f.read\(\)
    
    # Count major data structures \(dicts with capital letter names at module level\)
    data_dicts = len\(re.findall\(r'^[A-Z_]+\\s*=\\s*\\{', content, re.MULTILINE\)\)
    data_lists = len\(re.findall\(r'^[A-Z_]+\\s*=\\s*\\[', content, re.MULTILINE\)\)
    
    # Count helper functions \(def _something\)
    helpers = len\(re.findall\(r'^def _\\w+', content, re.MULTILINE\)\)
    
    # Count total lines of inline data \(dicts/lists without leading _\)
    inline_data_lines = len\(re.findall\(r'^\\s*\\{[^}]*\\}|^\\s*\\[[^\\]]*\\]', content, re.MULTILINE\)\)
    
    print\(f"\\n{filepath}"\)
    print\(f"  Tools: {tool_count}"\)
    print\(f"  Helper functions \(_*\): {helpers}"\)
    print\(f"  Module-level dicts: {data_dicts}"\)
    print\(f"  Module-level lists: {data_lists}"\)

EOFPYTHON)
